result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam R Merkel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Adam R Merkel is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Adam R Merkel was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Adam R Merkel was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Adam R Merkel was found guilty of Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Straight Time.
Apply 7 days sentence credit, if revoked.

miscConds.notes: Cash bail applied.  PAID IN FULL.
Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
No use or possession of alcohol, illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of any and all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
No violent contact with the victim or any other family member.
Anger Management or Domestic Violence counseling deemed appropriate by Agent.

timeConds.notes: Non-working hours (Huber) - STAYED.  To be used at Agent's discretion.
